name: The Art Commision
title: Director of IT
description: Managed the direction of the technology stack and the developers. This was a 25% remote, hands-on roll where I was involved daily with development and technical tasks.
responsibilities: Defining network architecture and cloud implementation.
Interfacing with the business and marketing units to define requirements.
Directing the efforts and prioritizations of the developers.
Implementing agile practices and planning to enhance the development flow.
accomplishments: I helped launch the first CODAVideo Awards.
I was invovled in a developing the deck and even was able to pitch to investors.
Successfully completed an emergency image CDN provider switch days before our awards kickoff.
learnings: I learned the hardships of a small startup dependent upon continued funding.
reasonLeft: The company was late in getting their next round of funding and had to cut everyone's pay in half. I had just gotten married and bought a house so I had to move on.
